title: Reckoning
description: Virginia Roberts Giuffre shares her account to NBC News’ Savannah Guthrie of being forced to have sex with Jeffrey Epstein and others in his powerful orbit, including Prince Andrew, and her allegation that Epstein’s associate, Ghislaine Maxwell, played a crucial role in his sex trafficking organization. Originally aired on NBC on September 20, 2019.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
